verses.roman:
śrī-caitanya-nityānanda-caraṇa cintiyā
patha chāḍi' upapathe yāyena dhāñā

synonyms: śrī-caitanya—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; nityānanda—of Lord Nityānanda Prabhu; caraṇa—the lotus feet; cintiyā—thinking of; patha chāḍi'-giving up the general pathway; upapathe—by the path not generally used; yāyena dhāñā—he went very swiftly.
translation: Thinking of the lotus feet of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu and Lord Nityānanda Prabhu, he left the general path and proceeded with great haste on the one not generally used.
